name: Oakland Adult & Career Education
description: Free adult education including GED, ESL, and career training in Oakland
fullDescription: Oakland Adult & Career Education provides free classes for adults including GED preparation, ESL, high school diploma, and career training.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free GED and high school diploma programs
- ESL (English as a Second Language) at all levels
- Career technical education
- Digital literacy and computer classes
- Citizenship preparation
- Parent education classes
howToGetIt:
1. Visit Oakland Adult & Career Education center
2. Complete registration and assessment
3. Enroll in appropriate classes
4. Classes are free for eligible adults
keywords: adult school, Oakland, Alameda, GED, ESL, high school diploma, adult education, career training, free classes
